TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NegotiateStream extends System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream

summary.span: 提供一个使用协商安全协议的流，以便对客户端-服务器通信中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

span.span: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用客户端和服务器之间传输进行身份验证和协助保护信息的类。Use the class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server. 使用，您可以执行以下操作。Using , you can do the following. - 客户端的凭据向服务器发送的模拟或委托。Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation. - 请求服务器身份验证。Request server authentication. - 加密和/或将其传输之前对数据签名。Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it. 传输的信息之前，必须执行身份验证。Authentication must be performed before transmitting information. 客户端请求进行身份验证使用同步方法，阻止，直到完成身份验证，或异步方法，不会阻止等待进行身份验证完成时。Clients request authentication using the synchronous methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete. 服务器请求进行身份验证使用同步或异步方法。Servers request authentication using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 客户端和服务器，（可选） 进行身份验证使用 Negotiate 安全协议。The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol. 在 Windows 95/98 系统中，Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) 是用于身份验证的协议。On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication. 在其他平台 Kerberos 协议来进行身份验证客户端和服务器支持它;否则使用 NTLM。On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used. 这些协议的详细说明，请参阅平台 SDK 文档 MSDN 上，在 msdn.microsoft.com/library/。For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/. 类执行使用安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI) 身份验证。The class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 当身份验证成功时，必须检查并属性以确定哪些安全服务将由来帮助保护你的数据在传输过程。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services will be used by the to help secure your data during transmission. 检查属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 可以获取有关远程客户端或服务器使用信息属性。You can get information about the remote client or server using the property. 如果身份验证失败，则会收到或。If the authentication fails, you will receive an or a . 在这种情况下，您可以重试不同的凭据进行身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. 发送使用同步数据或异步方法。You send data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 接收数据使用同步或异步方法。You receive data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 如果安全服务，如启用了加密或签名，这些会自动应用于您的数据。If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the . 将使用在创建时提供的流的数据传输。The transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the . 时提供此基础流，可以选择指定是否关闭也会关闭基础流。When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the also closes the underlying stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的客户端-服务器连接的客户端。The following code example demonstrates the client side of a client-server connection that uses the . 客户端进行身份验证，并以异步方式向服务器发送一条消息。The client authenticates and sends a message to the server asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#0)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的客户端-服务器连接的服务器端进行身份验证客户端和读取客户端发送一条消息。The following code example demonstrates the server side of a client-server connection that uses the to authenticate the client and read a message sent by the client. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#0)]

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，以对客户端-服务器连接中的客户端进行身份验证。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client side of a client-server connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在进行身份验证时不会阻止此方法的重载。The overloads of this method do not block while authentication is in progress. 若要阻止等待进行身份验证完成时，请使用其中一个方法。To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use one of the methods.

summary.span: 客户端调用此方法开始一个异步操作，以对客户端/服务器连接中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

span.span: Called by clients to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.

summary.span: 此方法不会进入阻止状态。

span.span: This method does not block.

returns.span: 一个指示异步操作状态的 对象。

span.span: An object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证使用客户端的。The authentication uses the client's . 为服务器指定没有服务主体名称 (SPN)。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模拟级别是，和的安全级别是。The impersonation level is , and the security level is . 类将构造用于相互身份验证的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 此方法是异步的不会阻止该操作完成时。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要阻止在操作完成之前，请使用其中一个方法重载。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 必须通过调用完成异步验证操作方法。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果身份验证失败，则收到或。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在这种情况下，您可以重试不同的凭据进行身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法开始异步身份验证时为客户端。The following code example demonstrates calling this method to begin an asynchronous authentication for the client. span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.

returns.span: 一个指示异步操作状态的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了加密、 签名或加密和签名，读取的操作从基础流中读取数据、 检查数据的完整性和对其进行解密。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it. 如果没有安全服务，如数据加密或签名正在使用，此方法将启动对基础流的异步读取的操作。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream. 此方法是异步的不会阻止该操作完成时。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要阻止在操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 异步读取的操作必须通过调用已完成方法。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 类不支持多个读操作。The class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations. 如果你尝试开始读取的操作，而另一个读取操作已在执行对同一个流，将引发异常。If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 不能调用此方法，直到您已成功通过身份验证。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要进行身份验证，调用之一， ， ，或方法。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启动一个异步读的操作。The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了加密、 签名或加密和签名，此方法从缓冲区中读取数据加密，符号，或加密和签名，并将其使用的基础流传输。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream. 如果没有安全服务，如数据加密或签名正在使用，此方法将启动对基础流的异步写操作。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous write operation on the underlying stream. 此方法是异步的不会阻止该操作完成时。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要阻止在操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 异步读取的操作必须通过调用已完成方法。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 类不支持多个同时进行写入操作。The class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations. 如果你尝试开始写入操作，而另一个写入操作已在执行对同一个流，将引发异常。If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 不能调用此方法，直到您已成功通过身份验证。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要进行身份验证，调用之一， ， ，或方法。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何开始异步写操作。The following code example demonstrates beginning an asynchronous write operation. span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
